content:
In March 2024, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 976 Russian artillery systems.

About thisinformsMinistry of Defence Ukraine.

As they emphasized in the department, it is the highest indicator one month from the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

“The impressive result of the work of Ukrainian soldiers. Ukraine will win! ” - noted in the Ministry of Defense.

As reported by the Armyinform, the loss of the Russian Federation per daymade780 invaders, 29 BBM and 30 artismen.
title: A new record of occupiers' losses: 976 Russian artisystems were destroyed in March of the Armed Forces
description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. As they emphasized in the department, this is the highest ...
author: Army Inform
